about.name: Anastasios Tilsizoglou
about.description: A dedicated quality assurance automation engineer with a keen interest in cyber security. With a solid foundation in software and web development, I possess in-depth expertise in utilizing a wide range of automation tools and frameworks, coupled with proficiency in multiple programming languages. I have a strong passion for continuous learning and embracing new challenges. Known for my organizational skills, tactical mindset, and friendly disposition, I thrive on collaboration and value constructive feedback from my peers. My goal is to enhance the quality of software products and services by implementing effective quality assurance practices. Currently, I am pursuing a master's degree in applied informatics, specializing in software quality assurance engineering and cyber security.
